name: Somnum Opus
description:
"Ah... I fell asleep on the job again. Might as well get a few tasks, done before i head home..."

The Player wakes up infront of a computer, with a mailprogram open. In the mail, you get told that the PC's on the school have been acting weird in the last period of time. Its now your job to factory reset and upload new systems on them, using your install all floppy discs. Every floppy disc is labeled with a room, remember to run run run run run run run run run
